skins.obtencion: Fall Festival prize map, costs 10 Prize Bulbs

This hat could also be a reference to the custom-made Unicorn Chomper plush toy that appears in Live From PopCap streams, as it would usually be placed on top of the head of the Keepin the Faith Munny, and both the plush and customization appear to be crocheted.
